name: Banshee VR
description:
Play with the power of Banshee in a VR environment. Generate shock-wave with your voice. Break and destroy to your heart’s content! The louder your voice, the more powerful the blast. Google Cardboard is recommended but not required for this experience.

Headphone is strongly recommended for this experience.

Supported device: iPhone 5

Smooth playback is not guaranteed on older devices.
